title: dEva dEva kalpayAmi
sahitya:
dEva dEva kalpayAmi sO ahamIsha mAmakam dEha gEhAdikam ca sakalamapitAvakam hi


caraNam 1    kuhanA vaTurUpAya ca tE mAhabaliryatA mahati dAna samayE nanu kalitavAnahO tathA
    caraNam 2    rAjasUya savana karmaNiha cAgraya pUjanE rAjitE yathA krtam ca dharmajEna pAvanE
    caraNam 3    bhavati tathA krEturEva krIta bharaNa paratA aviratam tavaiva mAmakA vanadUrvahatA
    caraNam 4    EvamaviduSA param yanmayAtra gaditam sEvakEna padmanAbha tE grahItumucitam
